 reg exp disabled

Enrique, you should assign this one to me.

I'm not sure if we should be searching by "type".  It should probably more C++ 
specific (i.e. structs, typedefs, enums, etc.).  For now, as a workaround, I'm 
making "type" search do the same thing as "class" search.

There are other issues in R2, so I'll defer those changes until later.
Reopen for R2 (so it can resolved for R2)
I've resolved this for R2 in the same way as R1.
